package_info.mp_subtitle: The default analytics module of Melis Platform.
package_info.mp_description:
This module activates the default and basic MelisCmsPageAnalytics.
It will come with a tool and a special tab on every page's edition.
The default tool allows to have a visitation counter on pages but is meant to be overidden by other modules dedicated to Google Analytics or any other similar system.
The tool offers the choice to select which analytics module (developped for Melis Platform) is to be used.
